content: As an AI language model, I cannot predict the future. However, while virtual reality therapy has shown promising results for the treatment of social anxiety disorder, it is important to remember that it may not be suitable for everyone. The decision to use virtual reality therapy versus traditional therapy will depend on individual preferences and needs. Some individuals may find traditional therapy more beneficial, while others may prefer the convenience and accessibility of virtual reality therapy. Ultimately, the choice between virtual reality therapy and traditional therapy should be made in consultation with a mental health professional to ensure the best possible outcome for the individual.
